name: OpenIdProvider
description: represents the connection details to a specific OpenID provider

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the SCIM Resource as defined by the Service Provider.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: A name that is used as human readable identifier that will be displayed in the UI

attributes.name: discoveryEndpoint
attributes.description: The url to the discovery endpoint of an OpenID Provider

attributes.name: authorizationEndpoint
attributes.description: The url to the authorization endpoint. This is an optional value in case that no discovery endpoint is provided

attributes.name: tokenEndpoint
attributes.description: The url to the token endpoint. This is an optional value in case that no discovery endpoint is provided

attributes.name: resourceEndpoints
attributes.description: A list of urls to defined resource endpoints that may be accessible with an acquired token

attributes.name: signatureVerificationKey
attributes.description: Base64 encoded public RSA key or X509 certificate that holds the public key for signature verification. This is an optional value in case that no JWKS endpoint is provided via discovery endpoint
